about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: Every sip tells a story, every moment creates memories
about.description: At Cafert, we believe that coffee is more than just a beverage – it's an experience that brings people together. Our journey began with a simple passion for creating the perfect cup of coffee, and today, we continue to craft exceptional coffee experiences for our valued customers.
about.missionText: To provide the highest quality coffee experience while creating a warm, welcoming environment where every customer feels at home.
about.qualityText: We source only the finest coffee beans from around the world
about.communityText: Building meaningful connections through shared coffee experiences
about.journeySubtitle: From humble beginnings to becoming a beloved coffee destination

menu.title: Our Menu
menu.subtitle: Discover our carefully crafted selection
menu.cappuccinoDesc: Classic Italian coffee with foamed milk
menu.mochaDesc: Espresso with chocolate and steamed milk

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.amazingCoffeeText: The best coffee I've ever had. The atmosphere is perfect for working and relaxing.
testimonials.perfectAtmosphereText: Love the cozy vibe and friendly staff. My go-to place for coffee meetings.
testimonials.outstandingServiceText: The staff is incredibly friendly and the coffee is consistently excellent.
testimonials.freshBeansText: The quality of their coffee beans is exceptional. You can taste the difference.
testimonials.cozyEnvironmentText: Perfect place to work, study, or just enjoy a great cup of coffee.
testimonials.bestInTownText: Hands down the best coffee shop in the area. Highly recommended!
